item.title: IIT Bombay DC-Hub Network and Hub's IP Address
item.description: Most likely all of the links mentioned on hub-list page are now dead. If there are lot of enlightened (and pervert) users over LAN then there would definitely be some Direct Connection (DC) hubs. And IIT Bombay is no exception. DC-hubs are maintained by undergraduate students. They download and share most of the data. I am greatly thankful to them for sharing latest animated movies etc. They have the enthusiasm and energy of young.
